import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { selectedStock,removeselectedStock } from '../../Redux/actions/stockActions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import "../../../assets/styles/custom/Stock.css" const StockDetails = () => { const stock = useSelector((state) => state.stock) const history = useHistory() const { StockId } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const config = { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}` } }; const axiosStockDetail = async () => { console.log('axiosa girdim') const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:18598/api/Stok/GetSelectedStock?ID=' + StockId, config) .catch(error => { if (error.response.status == '401') { history.push("/Login") } }) if (response != undefined) dispatch(selectedStock(response.data)); }; useEffect(() => { if (StockId && StockId !== "") { axiosStockDetail(); } return dispatch(removeselectedStock()); }, [StockId]); const columns = { id, stokkod, stokadı, miktar, birim, alışfiyat, satışfiyat, kdv, İskonto, } return (
Stock Update
stock.stokadı = e.target.value} value={stock.stokadı} />
this.Kullanıcıadi = e.target.value} />
this.Soyisim = e.target.value} />
this.Mailadres = e.target.value} />
this.Şifre = e.target.value} />
Already have an account? Login
) } export default StockDetails;
